title: Spygate 2.0, Baker Mayfield's lack of leadership, Better QB Prospect: Joe Burrow or Trevor Lawrence (Football 12/11)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Brady Quinn and Ryan Wilson to analyze what Spygate 2.0 really means and what the punishment for the Patriots could be (6:35). The guys also discuss Baker Mayfield's lack of leadership and continued culture problems with the Browns (20:30), Urban Meyer's potential fit in Dallas (37:45), the 2020 NFL Draft and where Joe Burrow ranks as one of the best prospects in recent memory (45:45), before answering 5-star reviews from Apple Podcasts (57:00).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
